scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection includes letters from Charle Fort to Tiffany Thayer, Ellsworth [T.T.] and E.E. [T.T.].

did.unittitle: Letter from Charles Fort to Tiffany Thayer 1925 Apr 13

scopecontent.p: Mentions Babbitt's books, "Odic" light, and Baron Reichenbach.

did.unittitle: C. F. to Ellsworth [T. T.] 1925 Jun 8

scopecontent.p: Mentions New Landsand Book of the Damnedand lack of demand for either.

did.unittitle: C. F. to E. E. [T. T.] 1925 Aug 14

scopecontent.p: Refers to witchcraft trials and his own research on occult powers.
